entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
